milestone.title: 8.5.0 release blockers
milestone.description: Issues that should be fixed before 8.5.0 release.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.title: Don't use Skyframe event handler for downloader events

labels.name: team-ExternalDeps
labels.description: External dependency handling, remote repositiories, WORKSPACE file.

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
These events may be sent during a Skyframe restart, which currently results in a crash. Since downloader events don't have to be stored for replay, they can use the build global event handler instance instead.

Fixes #26995

labels.name: soft-release-blocker
labels.description: Soft release blockers that are nice to have, but shouldn't block the release if it's the last one.

issue.body:
These events may be sent during a Skyframe restart, which currently results in a crash. Since downloader events don't have to be stored for replay, they can use the build global event handler instance instead.

Fixes #26995

Closes #27019.
